help: Archival metadata configuration (shared across all tools).
This file defines multi-language metadata texts for the archive.
languages: keys are BCP-47 codes like 'ru-RU', 'en-US'.
Each language block may contain: creator, credit, description, rights, terms, source.
- creator: string or array of strings (author names), written to XMP-dc:Creator as a list.
- Other fields: string or array of strings (multi-line text).
Exactly one language SHOULD have 'default': true – it is used as the default/x-default language.
- file-organizer: writes metadata to master files (MSR/RAW)
- preview-maker: copies metadata from master to preview (PRV)
- scan-batcher: can write initial metadata during scanning
For LangAlt tags (Description, Rights, UsageTerms), language-specific variants are written:
For non-LangAlt tags (Creator, Credit, Source), only the default language is written.
